scenes.background: [Monica] sighs deeply as [Bob] raises an eyebrow at your offer for a video call.
scenes.description: Bob leans back in his chair. 'So, is this video call a one-time thing or a new norm?'

options.text: Let's see how it goes this time and decide if it's effective.
options.analysis: You balance the suggestion with a trial approach, showing good self-regulation and social skills but lower empathy.

options.text: If video calls work well, we can make it a more regular solution.
options.analysis: You show high motivation and emotional perception by being open to new solutions, but self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: We should focus on in-person solutions. Video calls should be a last resort.
options.analysis: You prioritize in-person interactions, showing good empathy but lower emotional perception and motivation to adapt.
